value.title: Difference between duplicate and reference a query in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I am going to show you the difference between duplicate and reference a query in Power Query and what you can use them for. value.title: Dynamically find header rows and promote them in Power Query
value.excerpt: Dynamically find a column header and promote them in power query is  a very common requirement, specially if you are importing data from excel or pdfs for example. value.title: Enable QUERY FOLDING for native queries in Power Query / Power BI
